title: Run pre-flight checks for FO-06
description:
Verify the codebase is in a healthy state before starting FO-06 implementation.

This is the baseline check - full build verification runs ONCE here.

Commands to run:
- npm run build (verify build passes)
- npx tsc --noEmit (TypeScript check)

Document any pre-existing issues.

⚠️ Do not close this tick until the build passes.
acceptance_criteria: npm run build succeeds with no errors
closed_reason: All pre-flight checks passed: npm run build, npx tsc --noEmit, and npm run lint all completed successfully with no errors. Codebase is in healthy state for FO-06 implementation.
